Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Former New Courtland Senior Day Center Space

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Germantown House is a public housing facility designated for seniors and located in the historic Germantown neighborhood of Philadelphia. The development is located near shopping centers, banks, and a library, with great access to public transportation via the K bus and the 53 bus.
Conveniently located near the Hershey outlets and Hersheypark Drive.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The building is great for medical and professional tenants alike.

Join Drayer Physical Therapy, Sudbrink Oral Surgery Associates, and UPMC Imaging Services.

Class A medical and professional office building. State of the art facility located just minutes from Hospital, Schools, and shopping. Space offers mix of exam rooms and open treatment areas with oversize windows.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: State of the art medical facility

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:

Adjacent to the Cranberry Retail Corridor
